issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Implement levenshtein function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14413](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14413). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Returns the Levenshtein distance between two strings . For example, levenshtein('kitten', 'sitting') results in 3.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14413?focusedCommentId=17452946) by Pindikura Ravindra (pravindra):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11522
